name: raspi-peripheral
description: Provides a base class and pin management functions for the Raspi.js library suite

scripts.test: cross-env RASPI_IO_TEST_MODE=true istanbul cover ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js --captureExceptions spec/*.spec.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
